title: Caroline Flack looks furious and tense with boyfriend Lewis Burton on luxurious yacht
text:

There appeared to be trouble in paradise for Caroline Flack and her man Lewis Burton.

The Love Island host, 39, looked close to tears when she spoke to her toyboy love while they were onboard their dream yacht, off the coast of Ibiza in recent days.

As their explosive fight unfolded, an upset Caroline confronted Lewis as she held her phone up in his face so he could read the screen.

Things appeared to grow increasingly tense as the blonde bombshell held her hands up in the air when her young lover approached her.

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

During their heated discussion, the TV host looked fuming as she crossed her arms while Lewis leaned in towards his lover when they sat together.

The presenter got emotional and turned her head away from her handsome man as he appeared to try and console her.

The Mirror approached Caroline Flack's representative for further comment.

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

The Love Island star shielded her eyes with sunglasses and she wore a sun hat while she led out in the scorching hot sunshine.

Caroline dressed her bikini-clad figure in a wrap and she maintained her chic look with golden hoop earrings.

They were alone when they appeared to have the fight but the couple have been holidaying with friends as seen in Lewis' latest Instagram.

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

Caroline was pictured on the yacht with her close friend Ashley James recently.

It has been a full-on summer for the television sensation as she was away in Mallorca filming scenes for Love Island.

Caroline has been able to focus on her love life before she gets back to work on the new winter series of Love Island which is launching in January.

(Image: GTres / SplashNews.com)

The Caroline and Lewis love story all begun in August, shortly after she wrapped up shooting scenes for Love Island.

Sparks started flying between the couple as they enjoyed a series of dates across the British capital.

Caroline has plastered pictures of them all over her Instagram account which she shares with her 2.3million social media admirers.

She finally moved on with new boyfriend Lewis after her on/off romance with Andrew Brady came to an end last summer.

After a backlash for dating much younger men, Caroline said she was making "cougar" her badge of honour.

She told You magazine in February this year: "My current status is not just that I'm a cougar, I'm Queen Cougar, which I guess is something I'm supposed to be ashamed of.

"But I'm just not. If 'cougar' is supposed to be some kind of insult, I'm taking control of that and turning it into a badge of honour. I'm Caroline Louise Flack and I'm Queen of the Cougars."
description: Caroline confronted her love Lewis with her phone as they had a heated discussion on the luxury yacht off the coast of Ibiza
